content: Keep your doors open while freaking out your house guests with these tentacle doorstops that look like a sea monster is creeping in from under the door. Perfect for any type of flooring and created by hand, each doorstop is unique in shape and color.

Be the center of attention walking around with these high heels that look like you’ve stepped in chewing gum – but the nasty pre-chewed pink gum is actually the heel piece of the shoe. These high heels are perfect for girls who love unique or unusual fashion style.

The infamous Star Wars bounty hunter has returned in these beautifully detailed Boba Fett stained glass lamps. Built using the real helmet dimensions of Boba Fett, these geeky lamps incorporate over two hundred pieces of stained glass and are a must have collector’s item.

Add a relaxing touch your home or office with these translucent amethyst and agate carved skulls. Unlike the recent Indiana Jones movie, these crystal skulls don’t suck – and will be a centerpiece of conversation no matter where you put it.

Create your own functional work of art with these DIY light bulb lamps. These modular light bulb lamp kits include special connector pieces that allow you to construct your very own uniquely styled lamp, and even allow you to take it apart and remake it with a new design.

Combine your love of alcohol and arcade gaming with this beer tap arcade machine that comes with over sixty classic arcade titles and a five gallon keg. Capable of serving over fifty five beers from the tap, this gaming / beer machine is a must have for gamers who love to drink.

If you’re a family man, own a Cadillac hearse, or just enjoy busting a ghost or two, these Ghostbusters family car stickers were made for you. Each sticker pack includes Venkman, Stantz, Spengler, and Zeddemore in complete ghostbuster gear, and a floating Slimer.

Now you can decorate your home with trippy wall paintings that glow in the dark after being exposed to UV or natural sun light. Each painting glows for about six to twelve hours depending on the colors, and also includes a UV light to easily charge them up.

Ditch the car bed and upgrade to the only bed in the galaxy that will do the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs! The Millennium Falcon bed features hidden compartments for night time smugglers, as well as built in lighting in the front and back of the vehicle.

When a snickers bar just isn’t enough to satisfy your hunger, try chomping down a chocolate bar shaped like a full size human skull! Available in regular, white, and dark chocolate, the human skulls are perfect for Halloween parties or cannibals who have a sweet tooth.

Be prepared for any situation with this axe multi tool that contains and folds out twelve different tools, with everything from a hammer to a flat head screwdriver. With its hand crafted oak handle, the axe multi tool is a great gift idea for outdoorsy people.

Enjoy a full moon no matter what stage of the lunar cycle we’re on with this moon necklace pendant. These hand crafted moon pendants are seated in solid metal plates, giving it a durable finish so you can moon people for years and years.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Contact Lenses
content: Be the coolest kid at the rave with these glow in the dark contact lenses. Available in regular or prescription form, these trippy contact lenses will glow a neon green color when exposed to a black light, making them ideal for raves and Halloween parties.

Stop using those obsolete neck muscles to turn your head when you want to look at what is behind you while riding a bicycle – the rear view bike camera is an easy install, weather proof, battery rechargeable bicycle attachment that is perfect for lazy bicyclists.

Make your bed look like a giant retro Nintendo game system with this NES themed bed set that includes a full size blanket, sheets, and pillow covers that look like NES controllers. This geeky bed set is also a great way to ensure you never get laid.

Battle your fellow geeks like never before with these real laser powered lightsabers. Powered using the same technology as the world’s most powerful laser, these intense lightsabers are the closest thing we’ve ever seen to a real lightsaber outside of a movie theatre.

Get away to a beautiful deep sea paradise with this one of a kind underwater hotel. With a modest asking price of fifteen thousand dollars per person / reservation, the underwater hotel is the ultimate in unique hotel luxury and a dream getaway for ocean lovers.

Play a cruel joke on your friends by offering them some insanely hot gummy bears. These gummies might look harmless – but when your friends take a bite out of these evil gummies, they will think they are turning into a dragon because of the fire coming from their mouth!

No you’re not dead, but you have entered beer heaven – the walk in beer cooler is completely real and an essential addition to any man cave! Perfect for storing a huge assortment of cases of beer, kegs, and it even includes a built in draft tap.

Contend for the title of owning the ultimate transforming air to ground vehicle with this helicopter motorcycle hybrid. It’s perfect for flying over traffic jams and speeding down winding roads – or showing up to your ex-wife’s home to show her you’ve made it in life.

Motorized skateboards are nothing new, but this weight sensing skateboard takes things to a whole new level. It uses intuitive shifting of your body weight to move on the skateboard, similar to a Segway – just lean in the direction you want to go and the board will do the rest!

It’s not out of the ordinary for bowling alleys to have a pool hall, but this bowling ball billiards game brings the two sports together like never before! Played similar to a real game of pool, these giant billiard games are designed for cruise ships, hotels, and rich homeowners.

Cook a hearty meal with your favorite state with these map of America cooking pans. Each state is sold separately, but if you purchase all 48 state cooking pans you can perfectly piece them together for one amazing and expensive functional art piece. ‘Merica.

Is that a picnic in your pants or are you just happy to see me? These innovative pants improve the function over regular jean pants, allowing you to create an eating surface, or instant picnic table just by sitting with your legs criss-crossed.

Ride around on a motorcycle built from recycled scrapyard parts that looks just like the badass xenomorph species from the Aliens movies. The fully functional Alien motorcycles are custom built in Bangkok by the Ko Art Shop which builds unique creations for high end clientelle.

Whether you need to travel by land, air, or sea, the flying hovercraft can tackle any surface at speeds as high as 70 miles per hour thanks to its 130 horse power turbo charged engine while carrying a payload up to 600 pounds over a distance of 160 miles.

These aren’t just any regular light up shoes, these custom made kicks are hand made to order from the designer responsible for the lighting in the TRON movie and for Daft Punk. With each step you take, these shoes will light up any room and turn heads.

Have you very own face put on a throw pillow with these personalized face pillows. Perfect for immortalizing yourself, a friend, or even your pet, these custom made pillows have a variety of creative designs. Simply upload your photo, choose a shape, and order!

For years Star Wars fans and Ents have speculated over the hotbox like qualities of the mechanical R2-D2 droid, but now we know what his true purpose is – as a smoking pipe! Made from heavy duty glass, this is the perfect pipe for geeks. For tobacco use only.

Prepare your coffee in the morning as easily as you do a cup of tea with these clever coffee drip bags. All that is required is to tear open the coffee drip bag and place it over the cup, pour a cup of boiling water over it and voila – hot and delicious gourmet coffee!

Are you having trouble seeing at night while performing a breaking and entering? Could you use some added lighting while you beat someone in a dark alley? If you answered yes to either of these questions, then the glow in the dark crowbar is a the right tool for you!

Don’t live in fear of dropping those slippery soap bars in the showers – now you can easily shave off little flakes from a bar of soap with this clever soap dispensing tool. Prisons every where are already reporting a drop in shower rapes thanks to this wonderful shaver.

Light up your home or bedroom in a horrifying manner with these sea monster ceiling lamps that are reminiscent of the attacking barnacles from Half-Life. These incredibly detailed custom made ceiling lamps are limited in quantity – though a “do-it-yourself” tutorial is planned.

Don’t get labeled as an out of touch alcoholic drinking out of that old metal flask – these portable liquor shots are the latest in mobile alcoholic technology! Regardless of your liquor preference, these pocket liquor shots have it all from vodka to whiskey!

Remember when Apple was the little guy? Now you can encase your trendy new iPhone with this nostalgic Macintosh case that reminds of you a simpler time in Apple history when they didn’t dominate so many digital products. A must have collector’s item for Mac lovers.

Never before has living out of your car looked so appealing – the Jeep Action Camper is a slide on camper that provides an incredibly spacious and luxurious cabin with it’s pop up roof. Perfect for outdoor camping, it amazing makes Jeeps even more versatile.

Who says compact hand guns can’t pack a punch? The pocket pistol can load two .45 caliber or 9MM bullets in its manual loading chamber. Designed for concealed protection, this pocket sized pistol is perfect for people who want a compact but lethal handgun.

Take pictures like never before – the world’s smallest camera measures just over one inch in width and height! Perfect for covert picture shots, this tiny camera has an impressive two megapixel camera with an automatic focusing lens and also works as a video camera.

Get ’em while they’re hot! Start your morning off right with a healthy serving of pancakes with these giant pancake pillows. Each pancake is three feet wide, and comes with unique and realistic discolorations just like a real pancake. Syrup not included.

Avoid the grind of being stuck in traffic on your daily work commute and think outside the box with these electric suitcase scooters that can travel a distance up to forty miles with a maximum speed of thirty five miles per hour on just a single charge.

Light up your home or office using the awesome power of Science™! These levitating lamps use built in electromagnetic components to allow these futuristic lamps to float in thin air. Available in two unique styles, these lamps will be an instant conversation piece.

Lounge with a friend or loved one sitting right next to you with this stylish double patio lounger known as the Loopita Bonita. Designed by Victor Aleman, this roller coaster like patio lounger is a functional piece of art and will classy up any backyard patio.

Poolception – play pool while being in a pool with the waterproof pool table. As expensive as they are durable, these custom made water proof pool tables are a must have item for people who love billiards and hate their savings account.

Relax on these unique loungers that looks like a flying carpet. Perfect for adding a unique hangout spot to your home, these flying carpet lounger also work great as play area for kids. The wedges can be detached at any time as well without use of tools.

Enjoy the comfort and mobility of socks while still having the durability and protection of shoes with these Kevlar socks. Perfect for outdoors adventures on jagged surfaces such as rock climbing, these Kevlar socks will protect your feet just as well as any shoe will.

Keep your scumbag husband from venturing off with any other women with the anti-cheating wedding band ring – the only ring that will brand your husband’s ring finger with a “married” indentation on his skin for hours even after he takes off his ring.

The cake might have been a lie, but Portal themed cookies more than make up for it. With all the classic shapes like the companion cube, turret, and running subjects, these Portal cookie cutters are the perfect baking tool to make some deliciously geeky cookies.

Store your clothes, gear, etc. in a drawer chest that doubles as a functional Rubik’s Cube mind puzzle. A stylish addition to any kid’s bedroom, these Rubik’s Cube drawer chests can be built using the free guide from Instructables.

Never before has violence and alcohol meshed so perfectly than with these nunchuck beer can kits. Each kit comes with all the tools and materials you’ll need to transform your favorite beer brand into a pair of nunchucks so you can release your alcoholic warrior within.

Don’t be tied down by that pesky new born baby of yours, now you can satisfy your need for mobility and speed with the baby stroller scooter. Not only will you be getting to places quicker, but your baby will love the adrenaline rush you give him.

Whether you’re taking on hordes of zombies or just fighting one up close, the AK-47 rifle with an attached chainsaw is the go to weapon for zombie apocalypse survival. While not yet officially for sale, these unique AK-47 rifles are a must have item for doomsday preppers.

Relive the classic game of Battleship with an alcoholic twist – each direct hit results in a shot being taken in the game of Battleshots, and the winner is decided when you destroy all of your opponent’s battleships or either one of you passes out from alcohol poisioning!

Give your iPhone a one of kind earthy feel with these engraved bamboo iPhone cases. Laser cut and sanded by hand, these bamboo iPhone cases are meticulously crafted and come in a variety of artistic styles – just don’t count on them to actually protect your iPhone.

It’s a bird, it’s a plane, it’s… a flying superhero? Now you can troll curious onlookers with these radio control flying superheroes that from a distance look like actual flying humans! Adding a red superhero cape to really finish off the look is recommended too.

Your hang out spot just got upgraded – this hanging lounger is shaped like an over sized nest for humans, where you can relax, read a book, or even cuddle up with someone special. Each pod is available in a variety of styles so you can create your ultimate hangout spot.

Get twisted into all kinds of naughty positions with the Karmasheetra bedroom game. With specific positions for your hands, feet, and body, the Karmasheetra is played similar to the classic Twister game, with one small difference: you play this game naked.

Add some Super Mario style lighting to your home with these 8-Bit question block lamps. These geeky gamer lamps are touch sensitive, so you’ll need to punch it from the bottom to activate it just like in the Super Mario series, and it makes a classic 8-bit noise when hit.

Add some industrial lighting to your household with these galvazined iron industrial style pipe lamps. Constructed using recycled metal and available in many shapes, sizes, and styles – the Kozo lamp will add character to anywhere you place it.

Enjoy a hearty laugh at the expense of those dumb students of yours who never study for your quizzes with this “You Shall Not Pass” teacher’s grading stamp. This self-inking red stamp is the perfect tool for any disgruntled school teacher.

There is no better way to exhibit your fine taste, wealth and utter sophistication than by owning the world’s largest Scrabble board. This wall mountable Scrabble board is hand made and is nearly five times the size of the original game board.

Light up your house with a nuclear explosion! The nuke lamp is a unique table top light that is shaped after the explosion seen from a nuclear bomb detonation. Designed using fluid dynamic simulations to create the shape, this unique lamp will be an instant conversation piece.

Now you can experience a beautiful full moon every night regardless of the lunar cycle with these hanging moon lamps. Perfect for setting the mood, especially for romantic evenings, the moon lamp will add a unique ambiance any where you decide to hang it.

Train for the upcoming zombie apocalypse like never before with the 5K zombie survival marathon that will be coming to a city near you! This one of a kind marathon includes obstacle courses as well as endless zombies scattered throughout the marathon.

Own a piece of alien fighting technology with these replica Men In Black guns. Created by the same people who made the props from the actual movie, these highly detailed replica guns are a great gift idea for fans of Men In Black and movie prop collectors.

Add some firepower to your door knobs with these hand gun styled door openers. These hand guns aren’t just for looks either, pulling the trigger on these life like guns achieves the same effect as turning the handle on a conventional style door knob.

If you’re in the market for some serious bottle opening power, there’s nothing more fit for the job than these beer bottle opening wrenches. Each one of these tools started out as a real heavy duty wrench, but now they are modified for one purpose: cracking open a cold one.

There is no better ring to tie the knot with the type of girl who loves beauty, elegance, and violence than this brass knuckle engagement ring. Available in a sterling silver or brass finish, this unique mashup ring comes equipped with four cubic zirconia gems.

It’s hard to not do a barrel roll of excitement when you first see this Star Fox Arwing model plane. Made from real wood, this classic design perfectly captures the aircraft that Star Fox piloted in the legendary game series and also comes with the model stand shown.

Upgrade the appearance on your old propane gas tank to look just like a LEGO head with this free guide from Instructables. All you’ll need is a propane gas tank and a few assorted paint colors and you’ll be rocking the geekiest gas tank ever.

Proudly mount another zombie kill on your wall with these zombie trophy wall plaques. Painted by hand, these incredibly detailed zombies are the perfect gift idea for the taxidermist who has it all, and will be an instant conversation piece in any home.

Upgrade your bachelor pad with this modern aquarium sink that can accommodate both fish and plant life. Perfect for any over the top bathroom remodel, this unique sink comes equipped with an aquarium light, air pump, and two large entry points located at the top.

Look stylish and feel comfy at the same time with these dress pant sweatpants. Now you can wear sweat pants all week while watching cartoons on the couch without fear of social backlash thanks to these sweatpants that perfectly mesh style and comfort.

There’s no better way to take the edge off a hard day’s work than with a nice cold Duff beer at the local tavern, oh yeahhhhhhhhhh! These real Duff beers are a tribute to the iconic beer brand from the Simpsons, and makes a great gift idea for collectors.

Send a special message with every gift you wrap with these word search wrapping papers. Printed on high quality wrapping paper and available with twenty different messages, this unique wrapping paper makes even boring gifts awesome!

Reward your excellence in arm chair sports with these more realistic fantasy league trophies. Regardless of what type of fantasy league you are apart of, there is a hilarious trophy for every kind of sport, all the way from fantasy football to fantasy hockey.

Hang in there little buddy! Designed to let the aquarium be as interesting as the fish inside, each one of these oddly shaped yet fully functional bubble tank fish bowls are hand blown, ensuring each bubble tank is a one of kind aquarium.

Have you always wanted to get a tattoo but have trouble committing to just a single tattoo design? Now you can change the look of a tattoo whenever you want, or even hide it completely with this remarkable tattoo system that is surgically installed into your skin.

Carry your gear around in a duffle bag that looks like a classic spray paint can. Featuring built in pockets and shoulder straps, and made from water resistant fabrics, this spray paint can duffle bag makes a great gift for artists who want a unique way to transport their gear.

Oh my god, you killed Kenny… with your door! This free do it yourself guide from instructables will show you how to make these amazingly detailed Dead Kenny Doorstops that will be an instant conversation piece in any home or office.

That standard three megapixel camera in the iPhone not good enough for you? With this ingenious iPhone SLR Adapter you can now take incredibly detailed photos on your iPhone like never before by mounting your favorite SLR camera lens onto your iPhone.

Let your house guests know how violent you really are with these officially licensed Dexter Blood Sample Coasters. Regardless of whether you enjoy the TV show or are just really into serial killing, these coasters will be a great fit in your home.

You rent movies through the mail, why not rent your ties? Tie Society is like Netflix for ties – for a monthly fee you can rent a select amount of ties, just as you do with movies on Netflix. This monthly subscription makes a great gift for dad, with tons of high quality ties to choose from.

The cake may have been a lie, but cookies will definitely be served with this Portal Companion Cube Cookie Jar. This officially licensed Portal cookie jar is the perfect addition to any geek’s kitchen and also works great as candy serving jar too.

Play chess straight up with this Vertical Chess Set that hangs on your wall liked a framed painting. This unique Chess playing board will easily be a conversation piece in any home and makes a classy gift idea for any chess enthusiast.

Yarrrr matey, if ye be cravin’ an adventure on the high seas but be land stricken from a case of the scurvy, hop aboard this here Pirate Ship Play House. Built from rugged cedar and redwood, this twenty three foot long play house is the ultimate gift for kids.

Don’t get shown up by the Flendersons two houses over this Holiday season – go all out and over kill your Christmas decorations this year with the Two Story Inflatable Reindeer. It also includes an integrated fan that inflates this massive Reindeer in only five minutes!

Throw out your ugly Christmas sweaters, the barbarian beard beanie is the only thing you’ll ever need to keep warm during the winter. These braided beards come with a horned skull cap that merge together to keep you warm while making you look like a warlord.

Keep your poorly lit room well defended with the Portal Turret Flashlight. While this Portal Turret has had it’s dual machine guns disabled for civilian use, it does speak to you with classic lines from the Portal video game and makes a great stocking stuffer gift.

Forget to bring your guitar to band practice? No worries, now you can rock out wherever you go with this fully playable Guitar shirt that comes with a mini guitar amp speaker that outputs all major chords as you strum out the guitar using the included magnetic guitar pick.

Cook your hot dog with this funny and clever anatomically correct hot dog cooker statue made from stainless steel. The statue not only will entertain guests, but it will also allow you to get a slow cook on the hot dogs as they float above the grill.

Watch your iPhone change colors with just the touch of your hand, pocket or anything else with heat that might come in contact with this heat sensitive iPhone cover. Now whenever someone grabs your phone they will literally be caught red handed.

Create your own pixelated works of art or just purchase some of the cool pixel stickers already created with the Do It Yourself Pixel Art Sticker Studio. The pixel art studio is easy to use, just load it and start drawing pixels, save it, and purchase it!

Like most people, we have been disgruntled for years thanks to the Jetsons making us believe we’d have flying cars by the year 2000. Thankfully, the Future™ has finally arrived – flying cars are now available to the general public! All you need is a pilot’s license to fly it.

Now your children can sleep in the same type of vehicle they were conceived in – the VW Bus! This VW Bus Bunk Bed is the perfect space saving accessory to any kid’s room, with a bed on the top bunk and a seating and desk station at the bottom level.

Water ski anywhere and be in complete control with this unmanned water skiing boat that is controlled entirely by the skier. This unmanned skier boat holds up to six gallons of gas and automatically shuts off if the skier lets go of the handle.

This TRON style motorcycle is a fully functional and street legal bike that is powered by a Suzuki 996cc engine. While riding on the TRON motorcycle you lay in a flat position akin to the TRON movie. For only $55,000.00 you can tear up the streets TRON Style.

Who says jewelry can’t be interactive? The moving gears ring is a masterpiece of wearable engineering – with a simple twist of your fingers, you can make the gears on this handsome ring come to life – making it the ultimate wedding band for engineer geeks.

The Space Invaders couch is one of the highest quality retro video game couches ever made. Its sleek design and memory foam cushioning makes the Space Invaders couch not only incredibly nostalgic, but comfortable too, and it’s a great house warming gift for geeks.

Give your home some real character and show off your fish with the Labyrinth Aquarium. This Labyrinth Aquarium is designed for tropical fish and includes lights, filters, air pumps, cleaning supplies, and makes a cool gift idea for any home.

All your friends are going to be jelly this upcoming Halloween when you show up with a Rage Face Mask. Youjel.ly sells these brilliantly recreated, hand sculpted, latex rage face masks that will be instantly recognized by any of your fellow neckbeard interweb surfers.
